remarks: Trigonomic equality lemma for the Dirichlet Kernel trigonomic equality. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dirkertrigeqlem2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
dirkertrigeqlem2.sinne0 $e |- ( ph -> ( sin ` A ) =/= 0 ) $.
dirkertrigeqlem2.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
dirkertrigeqlem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( 1 / 2 ) + sum_ n e. ( 1 ... N ) ( cos ` ( n x. A ) ) ) / _pi ) = ( ( sin ` ( ( N + ( 1 / 2 ) ) x. A ) ) / ( ( 2 x. _pi ) x. ( sin ` ( A / 2 ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A n $.
$d N n $.
$d n ph $.
